articles.summary: What is an economic node? Bitcoin is a database, and a network to facilitate the updating and synchronization of updates to that database. It is used for the primary purpose of people. It's a conceptually similar to how a user interacts with Bitcoin network in the first place.

articles.title: Aave Expands to Sony Backed Soneium L2
articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: Aave has deployed its decentralized finance protocol on Soneium, an Ethereum layer two (L2) developed by Sony Block. Aave is using the Soneum protocol on top of the Ethereon protocol, developed by the Sony Block team.

articles.title: No One Fell for It: Paraguay's Bitcoin Legal Tender Announcement Was a Zero-Sum Hack
articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: A recent social media post by President Santiago Peña announced the enactment of bitcoin as Paraguay's legal tender, shook the social media world. Bitcoin is now the legal tender in Paraguay.    in use in the country since January 1st, 2013.

articles.title: Bitcoin Short-Term Holders Supply Dynamics Shift As Net Position Change Turns Negative
articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.summary: After a bullish performance on Monday, Bitcoin has taken the spotlight as it surges towards its current all-time high, achieved in May. Short-term investors are exhibiting a weakening sentiment toward the flagship digital asset, however. Bitcoin is the largest digital asset in terms of value.

articles.title: Paraguayan President's X account hacked
articles.summary: Paraguay's Cyber Incident Response Team (CERTpy) and X worked to resolve the issue on President Santiago Peña's official X account. The account posted a false claim about Peña announcing legislation to recognize Bitcoin as legal tender. The incident led to the postponement of the National Cybersecurity Strategy 2025-2028 launch.

articles.title: Vilonia joins Harrison in rejecting cryptomining
articles.author: Staff Report
articles.summary: Harrison rejected a proposal to build a cryptomine on the edge of its town. Vilonia did the same last week and it has become a move that has been seen across the state following the lead of Harrison. The proposal was rejected by Vilonia.
